Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Honor[ENDCOLOR] improves the effectiveness of one's army in a variety of ways.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Honor gives a +33% combat bonus VS Barbarians, and notifications will be provided when new Barbarian Encampments spawn in revealed territory. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire for each enemy unit killed. Unlocks building the Temple of Artemis.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Honor tree will grant [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each enemy unit killed. A free Great General appears. Great Generals can be purchased with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.
